title: Emmerdale fans spot vital clue left by Faith that confirms Nate's mum's identity
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale fans have spotted a vital clue that confirms the identity of Nate Robinson's mum - and it's a ticking timebomb.

In Tuesday night's episode, Nate revealed he was Cain Dingle's son in a shocking twist during their fight on the boat.

Meanwhile, back in the village, Faith collapsed to the floor after rummaging through the drawers in Nate's caravan and finding a photo.

In tonight's episode, it was very evident that Faith was left shaken by her explosive discovery when she came into the house shaking.

In a moment of panic, Faith frantically hid the photo she found under some papers in one of the drawers.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Startled Faith nearly jumped out of her skin when Pete Barton suddenly appeared behind her.

When Pete asked if she had found anything in Nate's caravan, Faith played ignorant and muttered: "No."

Pete was full of questions but Faith tried to bat them away and insisted she needed a strong drink.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

"I think we should stay out of this," claimed Faith, who was clearly rattled by her discovery in the caravan.

Confused Pete pointed out that she had been just as worried as he was and that Cain was ready to kill Nate.

Faith replied: "This is between them and one way or another they need to sort this out."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Emmerdale viewers took to Twitter to question what Faith knows about Nate's mum.

One viewer said: "So obviously Faith knows that Nate is Cains son, how does she know? When did she realise? Why hasn’t she mentioned it to Cain? He’s her grandson, why keep it secret?

"Faith knew Cain had a son out there," added another.

A third asked: "Are we supposed to be surprised Faith knew Cain had a son"

(Image: ITV)

(Image: SHARED CONTENT UNIT)

Lots of theories have been circulating over the true identity of Nate's mum - with some even claiming Cain might not be his real dad.

There has been no confirmation that the woman in the photo is actually Nate's mother but she is obviously linked to the farmhand in some way.

And it's clear that Faith did recognise the woman in the photo due to her seriously alarmed reaction.

Who is Nate's mum? Will we ever find out?

*Emmerdale airs weekdays on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Emmerdale's Faith Dingle was shaking after making an explosive discovery - and has a ticking timebomb
